question:
Consider the following irrigation projects with respective rivers:
  1. Gosikhurd National Irrigation Project - Krishna
  2. Shahpur Kandi Project - Ravi
  3. Ukai irrigation Project - Tapti
Which of the above is/are correctly matched?
explanation: Gosikhurd Irrigation Project is under execution on river Wainganga in Maharashtra. Shahpur Kandi Project is under execution on Ravi River in Punjab.
